description:
Long trail days call for trail shoes that back up your ambitions. Lightweight leather lets your feet breathe, while a supportive midsole and cushioned heel keep you stable and comfortable as you log kilometre after kilometre. A grippy outsole offers traction for sure-footed steps on rough and slippery terrain.

  • Full-grain leather upper provides long-lasting durability and comfort on the trail
  • Bellows tongue keeps trail debris out
  • Kinetic Fit™ BASE insole contours to foot for flexible cushioning
  • Moisture-wicking mesh liner resists odour buildup
  • EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
  • Vibram® TC5+ rubber outsole for no-slip grip
name: Merrell Siren 3 Traveller Light Hiking Shoes - Women's
